# Purely Planned Consulting

> Thoughtful, discreet lifestyle management, home organization, and concierge services for discerning clients in Washington D.C., Maryland & Virginia.

## About

Purely Planned Consulting is a professional lifestyle management and home organization company serving the Washington D.C., Maryland, and Virginia (DMV) metropolitan area. We provide personalized, confidential services to individuals and families who value discretion, quality, and a well-managed life.

## Services

- **Lifestyle Consulting**: Strategic guidance for a more balanced, well-managed life — time management, household systems, productivity routines, goal setting, and family coordination.
- **Home & Office Organizing**: Decluttering, space planning, storage systems, paperwork management, and donation/removal coordination.
- **Personal Concierge**: Errand running, vendor coordination, appointment scheduling, shopping, and day-to-day household oversight.
- **Move Management**: End-to-end relocation project management — unpacking, storage inventory, mover supervision, donation coordination, utility transfers, vendor liaison, and overall project oversight.

## Service Area

Washington D.C., Maryland, and Virginia (the DMV metropolitan area).

## Contact

- Email: info@purelyplannedconsulting.com

- Client Intake Form: https://purelyplannedconsulting.com/intake

## Key Differentiators

- Confidential and discreet service
- Background-verified staff
- Fully insured
- Personalized approach — no cookie-cutter solutions
- Serving high-profile and privacy-conscious clients
